response.overview: The DECONSTRUCTION TOUR 2003 was captured by the expert film crew of Jay Schweitzer,Troy Adamitis and Jordan Burns of BBB-Productions, whom had already filmed and produced several Motocross and Extreme Sport Videos such as the Moto XXX series, The Great Outdoors, and Eargasm.  Included are: NOFX, BOY SETS FIRE, STRUNG OUT, THRICE, TERRORGRUPPE, BOUNCING SOULS, REAL McKENZIES, TSOL, and FABULOUS DISASTER, along with exclusive backstage footage, interviews with the bands, athletes, and even with tour founder Dave Pollack.
response.title: Deconstruction! Tour 2003 (Live In Europe)
